7NG.F.summary: Acroud AB (publ) owns, develops, and operates comparison and news sites, primarily in iGaming affiliation in Sweden. The company was formerly known as Net Gaming Europe AB (publ) and changed its name to Acroud AB (publ) in July 2020. Acroud AB (publ) was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Gzira, Malta.

ACROUD.ST.summary: Acroud AB (publ) owns, develops, and operates comparison and news sites, primarily in iGaming affiliation in Sweden. The company was formerly known as Net Gaming Europe AB (publ) and changed its name to Acroud AB (publ) in July 2020. Acroud AB (publ) was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Gzira, Malta.

ASPGF.summary: Aspire Global plc provides managed online gaming solutions to operators and white labels in the Nordic countries, the United Kingdom, Ireland, rest of Europe, and internationally. It operates through Business to Business and Business to Customer segments. The company offers a full-service solution to partners for launching and operating online casinos, sports betting, and bingos; third party service, such as game providers and providers of payment service solutions; customer support and retention services; regulation and compliance services; payment solutions and risk management services; and CRM services, as well as data analysis services. It also provides financial, fraud prevention, hosting, and network management services, as well as operates as a game aggregator; and operates under licensing in various markets. In addition, the company offers casino, bingo, and sports networks under various proprietary brands. The company was formerly known as NeoPoint Technologies Limited and changed its name to Aspire Global plc. Aspire Global plc was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Silema, Malta.

ASPIRE.ST.summary: Aspire Global plc provides managed online gaming solutions to operators and white labels in the Nordic countries, the United Kingdom, Ireland, rest of Europe, and internationally. It operates through Business to Business and Business to Customer segments. The company offers a full-service solution to partners for launching and operating online casinos, sports betting, and bingos; third party service, such as game providers and providers of payment service solutions; customer support and retention services; regulation and compliance services; payment solutions and risk management services; and CRM services, as well as data analysis services. It also provides financial, fraud prevention, hosting, and network management services, as well as operates as a game aggregator; and operates under licensing in various markets. In addition, the company offers casino, bingo, and sports networks under various proprietary brands. The company was formerly known as NeoPoint Technologies Limited and changed its name to Aspire Global plc. Aspire Global plc was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Silema, Malta.

BAT.JO.summary: Brait PLC, an investment holding company, focuses on its investment portfolio of sizeable unlisted businesses operating in the consumer sector. Its primary investment portfolio includes Virgin Active, Premier, Iceland Foods, and New Look. The company's New Look business offers clothing products and footwear for women and teenage girls; and provides menswear through online. It also operates 243 health clubs under Virgin Active in South Africa, the United Kingdom, Italy, Australia, Namibia, Botswana, Thailand, and Singapore. In addition, the company operates Premier, which produces fast moving consumer goods, including wheat flour, maize meal, bread, feminine hygiene products, sugar confectionery, pasta, biscuit, animal feeds, and other food products in South Africa, Eswatini, Lesotho, and Mozambique. Further, it manufactures and supplies glass packaging products to the beverage and food companies through Consol in South Africa, Nigeria, and Kenya. Brait PLC was incorporated in 2011 and is based in San Gwann, Malta.

CAGPF.summary: Cryptology Asset Group p.l.c., an asset manager, invests in crypto assets and crypto companies, and advises blockchain based businesses. It also trades in crypto currencies and tokens. The company is based in Sliema, Malta.

CAP.DU.summary: Cryptology Asset Group p.l.c., an asset manager, invests in crypto assets and crypto companies, and advises blockchain based businesses. It also trades in crypto currencies and tokens. The company is based in Sliema, Malta.

CAP.F.summary: Cryptology Asset Group p.l.c., an asset manager, invests in crypto assets and crypto companies, and advises blockchain based businesses. It also trades in crypto currencies and tokens. The company is based in Sliema, Malta.

CTM.ST.summary: Catena Media plc, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an online lead generation company within iGaming and financial services markets. It attracts consumers through online marketing techniques, such as search engine optimization and pay-per-click. The company operates in the United Kingdom, the United States, Sweden, Serbia, Italy, Malta, Japan, and Canada. Catena Media plc was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Gzira, Malta.

GI11.F.summary: Gaming Innovation Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides gaming, betting, media, and turnkey platform solutions and services in Nordic countries, other European countries, and internationally. The company offers a player account management, a technical platform offering various services for iGaming operators, such as game and payment services, and ancillary services comprising live chat, email systems, affiliate systems, and CRM. It also provides media services, including digital marketing services comprising keyword and pay-per-click advertising, SEO, SEM, and affiliate and permission marketing services for online casino, poker, and sports betting, as well as operates various content websites; and sportsbook, a sports betting omnichannel solution that offers a various digital content and sports events to players. In addition, the company offers managed services that include 27/7 customer support, content management, etc., as well as omnichannel solutions; date solutions that allow operators to make decisions on marketing, compliance, and bonus promotion; Logic, a real-time rules engine that enables operators to define and create business rules; frontend framework and customer management system solutions; and marketing compliance solutions. Gaming Innovation Group Inc. has a strategic partnership with Betgenius Limited to create a sportsbook and platform solution for operators in regulated markets worldwide. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in St Julians, Malta.

GIG.OL.summary: Gaming Innovation Group Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides gaming, betting, media, and turnkey platform solutions and services in Nordic countries, other European countries, and internationally. The company offers a player account management, a technical platform offering various services for iGaming operators, such as game and payment services, and ancillary services comprising live chat, email systems, affiliate systems, and CRM. It also provides media services, including digital marketing services comprising keyword and pay-per-click advertising, SEO, SEM, and affiliate and permission marketing services for online casino, poker, and sports betting, as well as operates various content websites; and sportsbook, a sports betting omnichannel solution that offers a various digital content and sports events to players. In addition, the company offers managed services that include 27/7 customer support, content management, etc., as well as omnichannel solutions; date solutions that allow operators to make decisions on marketing, compliance, and bonus promotion; Logic, a real-time rules engine that enables operators to define and create business rules; frontend framework and customer management system solutions; and marketing compliance solutions. Gaming Innovation Group Inc. has a strategic partnership with Betgenius Limited to create a sportsbook and platform solution for operators in regulated markets worldwide. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in St Julians, Malta.

GMBL.summary: Esports Entertainment Group, Inc. operates as an online gambling company in Canada. The company offers esports entertainment, esports wagering, and iGaming and traditional sports betting services, as well as professional and amateur esports events. It also operates vie.gg, an online esports wagering website. The company was formerly known as VGambling, Inc. and changed its name to Esports Entertainment Group, Inc. in May 2017. Esports Entertainment Group, Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Birkirkara, Malta.

KAMBI.ST.summary: Kambi Group plc operates as a business-to-business supplier of managed sports betting services to business-to-consumer gaming operators in Europe, the Americas, and internationally. It offers services, including compliance, odds-compiling, customer intelligence, and risk management services built on an in-house developed software platform. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Ta' Xbiex, Malta.

KIND-SDB.ST.summary: Kindred Group plc operates an online gambling business primarily in Europe, Australia, and the United States. The company offers pre-game and live sports betting, including horse racing betting; poker; casino and games; and bingo through various brands, such as the 32 Red, bingo.com, Bohemia Casino, Casinohuone, Pokerhuone, Bingohuone, iGame, Kolikkopelit, Maria Casino, RoxyPalace, Storspelare, Storspiller, Unibet, and Vlad Cazino. As of December 31, 2019, it had approximately 27 million registered customers worldwide. The company was formerly known as Unibet Group plc and changed its name to Kindred Group plc in December 2016. Kindred Group plc was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Sliema, Malta.

KMBIF.summary: Kambi Group plc operates as a business-to-business supplier of managed sports betting services to business-to-consumer gaming operators in Europe, the Americas, and internationally. It offers services, including compliance, odds-compiling, customer intelligence, and risk management services built on an in-house developed software platform. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Ta' Xbiex, Malta.

KNDGF.short_name: KINDRED GROUP PLC SDR EACH REP
KNDGF.summary: Kindred Group plc operates an online gambling business primarily in Europe, Australia, and the United States. As of December 31, 2019, it had approximately 27 million registered customers worldwide. The company was formerly known as Unibet Group plc and changed its name to Kindred Group plc in December 2016. Kindred Group plc was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Sliema, Malta.

M8G.DE.summary: Media and Games Invest plc operates in the digital media and gaming sectors in Europe, North and South America, and Australia. It operates through B2C/Game Publishing and B2B/Media and Platform Services segments. The company's portfolio of online and console games include casual games, role-play games, strategy games, and massively multiplayer online games (MMOGs). It provides approximately 30 MMOGs and 5,000 casual games. The company also offers B2B/media and platform services; mobile advertising and payment services; online video, social, and influencer marketing services for gaming companies; and programmatic and open market traffic marketing services. In addition, it owns and operates various game portals; manages YouTube channels for companies; supports YouTube stars and influencers, as well as designs and implements influencer campaigns; and operates online platform for the brand owners to set up their social marketing campaigns, book registered influencer, and analyses the impact and coverage of such influencer marketing activities. The company was formerly known as blockescence plc. Media and Games Invest plc is based in Valletta, Malta.

RAKE.ST.summary: Raketech Group Holding PLC operates as an online affiliate and content marketing company worldwide. The company offers comparison services, online guides, communities, and social media products for the online gaming, online casino, sports betting, TV sports, consumer finance, and cryptocurrency industries. It operates CasinoGuide.se, a casino review Website; BetXpert.com that offers sports betting content, expert betting advice, and live match data from sports; TurtleBet.com that provides casino content, bonus offers, and sports betting news. The company also operates TV sports guide family, which offer real-time listings, live scores, and match information to sports fans; LÃ¥napengar.com, a financial platform; Betting.se, a sports betting Website; and CasinoFeber.se that provides casino-related content, including casino news, reviews and latest promotions. In addition, it operates CasinoBonusar.nu that offers promotions, bonus spin offers, and campaigns; Cryptimi.com, a digital currency and block chain review site; Casinoer.com, an online guide; Urheiluveikkaus.com, a sports betting affiliate product; and Norskkreditt.no, a consumer finance Website. Raketech Group Holding PLC was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in St Julian's, Malta.

RIVER.OL.summary: River iGaming p.l.c., together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in acquiring, building, and consolidating an ecosystem of companies throughout the iGaming value chain. It also operates in the online media industry; and offers software solutions. It serves both B2B and B2C markets. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in St Julian's, Malta.

TDH.JO.summary: Tradehold Limited, an investment holding company, owns, develops, manages, and leases real estate properties. It manages a property portfolio, which includes retail, office, industrial, residential, and leisure properties. The company is also involved in the ownership and development of commercial properties; and provision of treasury services. It operates in the United Kingdom, South Africa, Mozambique, Namibia, Botswana, Zambia, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Malta, and Mauritius. The company is based in San Gwann, Malta.

UIE.CO.summary: UIE PLC invests in the agro-industrial sector. The company primarily cultivates oil palm and coconuts, and processes palm oil. It operates in Malaysia, Indonesia, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as United International Enterprises Limited and changed its name to UIE PLC in October 2020. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Ta' Xbiex, Malta. UIE PLC is a subsidiary of Brothers Holding Limited.

UNBA.F.summary: Kindred Group plc operates an online gambling business primarily in Europe, Australia, and the United States. The company offers pre-game and live sports betting, including horse racing betting; poker; casino and games; and bingo through various brands, such as the 32 Red, bingo.com, Bohemia Casino, Casinohuone, Pokerhuone, Bingohuone, iGame, Kolikkopelit, Maria Casino, RoxyPalace, Storspelare, Storspiller, Unibet, and Vlad Cazino. As of December 31, 2019, it had approximately 27 million registered customers worldwide. The company was formerly known as Unibet Group plc and changed its name to Kindred Group plc in December 2016. Kindred Group plc was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Sliema, Malta.
